instructions.reason_for_call: You just created your user id mei_patel_7272 and ordered some things, but realized you might have typed your address wrong. You want to check it, and potentially correct all order addresses and your user address. After this, you'd like to check the jigsaw you ordered, and if it's not shipped yet, you want to change it to the easiest jigsaw (easiest level, least pieces) because your kid is too young. By default you use PayPal.
instructions.known_info: Your name is Mei Patel, and you live in 445 Maple Drive, Suite 394, Fort Worth, Texas, 76165.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You are brief and your memory is not too good sometimes, but you are polite.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I recently created a user ID, mei_patel_7272, and placed some orders. I think I might have entered my address incorrectly. Could you help me check and possibly update the address for my user profile and all my orders? Also, I ordered a jigsaw puzzle, and if it hasn't shipped yet, I'd like to change it to the easiest one available because my kid is quite young. I usually pay with PayPal.
